alert.note: Alert for Potter (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 24 at 3:00PM EDT until March 26 at 5:00AM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM SATURDAY TO 5 AM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Potter County. * WHEN...From 6 PM Saturday to 5 AM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. For high wind safety information, visit weather.gov/wind. The latest forecast information can be found on the NWS State College Facebook page and Twitter @NWSStateCollege, or on the web at weather.gov/ctp.
